meanings.definition: To enjoy or appreciate something fully
meanings.sent1: She savoured the delicious chocolate cake.
meanings.sent3: The little girl savoured every bite of her ice cream cone.
meanings.sent4: The traveler savoured the sights and sounds of the bustling city.
meanings.sent5: The musician savoured the sweet melody of the piano.

meanings.definition: To taste or smell something with pleasure
meanings.sent1: The chef savoured the aroma of the freshly baked bread.
meanings.sent2: She savoured the rich flavor of the coffee.
meanings.sent3: The detective savoured the scent of the clue that led to the suspect.
meanings.sent4: The hiker savoured the crisp air of the mountain peak.
meanings.sent5: The gardener savoured the fragrance of the blooming roses.
